info.title: Discord HTTP API (Preview)
info.description: Preview of the Discord v10 HTTP API specification. See https://discord.com/developers/docs for more details.

oneOf.title: USERS
oneOf.description: Controls role mentions

oneOf.title: ROLES
oneOf.description: Controls user mentions

oneOf.title: EVERYONE
oneOf.description: Controls @everyone and @here mentions

oneOf.title: SUB_COMMAND
oneOf.description: A sub-action within a command or group

oneOf.title: SUB_COMMAND_GROUP
oneOf.description: A group of subcommands

oneOf.title: STRING
oneOf.description: A string option

oneOf.title: INTEGER
oneOf.description: An integer option. Any integer between -2^53 and 2^53 is a valid value

oneOf.title: BOOLEAN
oneOf.description: A boolean option

oneOf.title: USER
oneOf.description: A snowflake option that represents a User

oneOf.title: CHANNEL
oneOf.description: A snowflake option that represents a Channel. Includes all channel types and categories

oneOf.title: ROLE
oneOf.description: A snowflake option that represents a Role

oneOf.title: MENTIONABLE
oneOf.description: A snowflake option that represents anything you can mention

oneOf.title: NUMBER
oneOf.description: A number option. Any double between -2^53 and 2^53 is a valid value

oneOf.title: ATTACHMENT
oneOf.description: An attachment option

oneOf.title: ROLE
oneOf.description: This permission is for a role.

oneOf.title: USER
oneOf.description: This permission is for a user.

oneOf.title: CHANNEL
oneOf.description: This permission is for a channel.

oneOf.title: CHAT
oneOf.description: Slash commands; a text-based command that shows up when a user types /

oneOf.title: USER
oneOf.description: A UI-based command that shows up when you right click or tap on a user

oneOf.title: MESSAGE
oneOf.description: A UI-based command that shows up when you right click or tap on a message

oneOf.title: BLOCK_MESSAGE
oneOf.description: Block a user's message and prevent it from being posted. A custom explanation can be specified and shown to members whenever their message is blocked

oneOf.title: FLAG_TO_CHANNEL
oneOf.description: Send a system message to a channel in order to log the user message that triggered the rule

oneOf.title: USER_COMMUNICATION_DISABLED
oneOf.description: Temporarily disable a user's ability to communicate in the server (timeout)

oneOf.title: QUARANTINE_USER
oneOf.description: Prevent a user from interacting in the server

oneOf.title: MESSAGE_SEND
oneOf.description: A user submitted a message to a channel

oneOf.title: GUILD_MEMBER_JOIN_OR_UPDATE
oneOf.description: A user is attempting to join the server or a member's properties were updated.

oneOf.title: PROFANITY
oneOf.description: Words and phrases that may be considered profanity

oneOf.title: SEXUAL_CONTENT
oneOf.description: Words and phrases that may be considered as sexual content

oneOf.title: SLURS
oneOf.description: Words and phrases that may be considered slurs and hate speech

oneOf.title: KEYWORD
oneOf.description: Check if content contains words from a list of keywords or matches regex

oneOf.title: SPAM_LINK
oneOf.description: DEPRECATED

oneOf.title: ML_SPAM
oneOf.description: Check if content represents generic spam

oneOf.title: DEFAULT_KEYWORD_LIST
oneOf.description: Check if content contains words from internal pre-defined wordsets

oneOf.title: MENTION_SPAM
oneOf.description: Check if content contains more unique mentions than allowed

oneOf.title: ar
oneOf.description: The ar locale

oneOf.title: bg
oneOf.description: The bg locale

oneOf.title: cs
oneOf.description: The cs locale

oneOf.title: da
oneOf.description: The da locale

oneOf.title: de
oneOf.description: The de locale

oneOf.title: el
oneOf.description: The el locale

oneOf.title: en-GB
oneOf.description: The en-GB locale

oneOf.title: en-US
oneOf.description: The en-US locale

oneOf.title: es-419
oneOf.description: The es-419 locale

oneOf.title: es-ES
oneOf.description: The es-ES locale

oneOf.title: fi
oneOf.description: The fi locale

oneOf.title: fr
oneOf.description: The fr locale

oneOf.title: he
oneOf.description: The he locale

oneOf.title: hi
oneOf.description: The hi locale

oneOf.title: hr
oneOf.description: The hr locale

oneOf.title: hu
oneOf.description: The hu locale

oneOf.title: id
oneOf.description: The id locale

oneOf.title: it
oneOf.description: The it locale

oneOf.title: ja
oneOf.description: The ja locale

oneOf.title: ko
oneOf.description: The ko locale

oneOf.title: lt
oneOf.description: The lt locale

oneOf.title: nl
oneOf.description: The nl locale

oneOf.title: no
oneOf.description: The no locale

oneOf.title: pl
oneOf.description: The pl locale

oneOf.title: pt-BR
oneOf.description: The pt-BR locale

oneOf.title: ro
oneOf.description: The ro locale

oneOf.title: ru
oneOf.description: The ru locale

oneOf.title: sv-SE
oneOf.description: The sv-SE locale

oneOf.title: th
oneOf.description: The th locale

oneOf.title: tr
oneOf.description: The tr locale

oneOf.title: uk
oneOf.description: The uk locale

oneOf.title: vi
oneOf.description: The vi locale

oneOf.title: zh-CN
oneOf.description: The zh-CN locale

oneOf.title: zh-TW
oneOf.description: The zh-TW locale

oneOf.title: DM
oneOf.description: A direct message between users

oneOf.title: GROUP_DM
oneOf.description: A direct message between multiple users

oneOf.title: GUILD_TEXT
oneOf.description: A text channel within a server

oneOf.title: GUILD_VOICE
oneOf.description: A voice channel within a server

oneOf.title: GUILD_CATEGORY
oneOf.description: An organizational category that contains up to 50 channels

oneOf.title: GUILD_ANNOUNCEMENT
oneOf.description: A channel that users can follow and crosspost into their own server (formerly news channels)

oneOf.title: ANNOUNCEMENT_THREAD
oneOf.description: A temporary sub-channel within a GUILD_ANNOUNCEMENT channel

oneOf.title: PUBLIC_THREAD
oneOf.description: A temporary sub-channel within a GUILD_TEXT or GUILD_THREADS_ONLY channel type set

oneOf.title: PRIVATE_THREAD
oneOf.description: A temporary sub-channel within a GUILD_TEXT channel that is only viewable by those invited and those with the MANAGE_THREADS permission

oneOf.title: GUILD_STAGE_VOICE
oneOf.description: A voice channel for hosting events with an audience

oneOf.title: GUILD_DIRECTORY
oneOf.description: The channel in a hub containing the listed servers

oneOf.title: GUILD_FORUM
oneOf.description: Channel that can only contain threads

oneOf.title: DEFAULT
oneOf.description: No default has been set for forum channel

oneOf.title: LIST
oneOf.description: Display posts as a list

oneOf.title: GRID
oneOf.description: Display posts as a collection of tiles

oneOf.title: DISABLED
oneOf.description: media content will not be scanned

oneOf.title: MEMBERS_WITHOUT_ROLES
oneOf.description: media content sent by members without roles will be scanned

oneOf.title: ALL_MEMBERS
oneOf.description: media content sent by all members will be scanned

oneOf.title: ANIMATED_BANNER
oneOf.description: guild has access to set an animated guild banner image

oneOf.title: ANIMATED_ICON
oneOf.description: guild has access to set an animated guild icon

oneOf.title: APPLICATION_COMMAND_PERMISSIONS_V2
oneOf.description: guild is using the old permissions configuration behavior

oneOf.title: AUTO_MODERATION
oneOf.description: guild has set up auto moderation rules

oneOf.title: BANNER
oneOf.description: guild has access to set a guild banner image

oneOf.title: COMMUNITY
oneOf.description: guild can enable welcome screen, Membership Screening, stage channels and discovery, and             receives community updates

oneOf.title: CREATOR_MONETIZABLE_PROVISIONAL
oneOf.description: guild has enabled monetization

oneOf.title: CREATOR_STORE_PAGE
oneOf.description: guild has enabled the role subscription promo page

oneOf.title: DEVELOPER_SUPPORT_SERVER
oneOf.description: guild has been set as a support server on the App Directory

oneOf.title: DISCOVERABLE
oneOf.description: guild is able to be discovered in the directory

oneOf.title: FEATURABLE
oneOf.description: guild is able to be featured in the directory

oneOf.title: INVITES_DISABLED
oneOf.description: guild has paused invites, preventing new users from joining

oneOf.title: INVITE_SPLASH
oneOf.description: guild has access to set an invite splash background

oneOf.title: MEMBER_VERIFICATION_GATE_ENABLED
oneOf.description: guild has enabled Membership Screening

oneOf.title: MORE_STICKERS
oneOf.description: guild has increased custom sticker slots

oneOf.title: NEWS
oneOf.description: guild has access to create announcement channels

oneOf.title: PARTNERED
oneOf.description: guild is partnered

oneOf.title: PREVIEW_ENABLED
oneOf.description: guild can be previewed before joining via Membership Screening or the directory

oneOf.title: RAID_ALERTS_DISABLED
oneOf.description: guild has disabled activity alerts in the configured safety alerts channel

oneOf.title: ROLE_ICONS
oneOf.description: guild is able to set role icons

oneOf.title: ROLE_SUBSCRIPTIONS_AVAILABLE_FOR_PURCHASE
oneOf.description: guild has role subscriptions that can be purchased

oneOf.title: ROLE_SUBSCRIPTIONS_ENABLED
oneOf.description: guild has enabled role subscriptions

oneOf.title: TICKETED_EVENTS_ENABLED
oneOf.description: guild has enabled ticketed events

oneOf.title: VANITY_URL
oneOf.description: guild has access to set a vanity URL

oneOf.title: VERIFIED
oneOf.description: guild is verified

oneOf.title: VIP_REGIONS
oneOf.description: guild has access to set 384kbps bitrate in voice (previously VIP voice servers)

oneOf.title: WELCOME_SCREEN_ENABLED
oneOf.description: guild has enabled the welcome screen

oneOf.title: NONE
oneOf.description: Guild has no MFA/2FA requirement for moderation actions

oneOf.title: ELEVATED
oneOf.description: Guild has a 2FA requirement for moderation actions

oneOf.title: ONBOARDING_DEFAULT
oneOf.description: Only Default Channels considered in constraints

oneOf.title: ONBOARDING_ADVANCED
oneOf.description: Default Channels and Onboarding Prompts considered in constraints

oneOf.title: GUILD_ONLY
oneOf.description: the scheduled event is only accessible to guild members

oneOf.title: REMOVE_ROLE
oneOf.description: Remove role

oneOf.title: KICK
oneOf.description: Kick

oneOf.title: ONE_DAY
oneOf.description: 1 day

oneOf.title: THREE_DAYS
oneOf.description: 3 days

oneOf.title: SEVEN_DAYS
oneOf.description: 7 days

oneOf.title: FOURTEEN_DAYS
oneOf.description: 14 days

oneOf.title: THIRTY_DAYS
oneOf.description: 30 days

oneOf.title: PING
oneOf.description: Sent by Discord to validate your application's interaction handler

oneOf.title: APPLICATION_COMMAND
oneOf.description: Sent when a user uses an application command

oneOf.title: MESSAGE_COMPONENT
oneOf.description: Sent when a user interacts with a message component previously sent by your application

oneOf.title: APPLICATION_COMMAND_AUTOCOMPLETE
oneOf.description: Sent when a user is filling in an autocomplete option in a chat command

oneOf.title: MODAL_SUBMIT
oneOf.description: Sent when a user submits a modal previously sent by your application

oneOf.title: ACTION_ROW
oneOf.description: Container for other components

oneOf.title: BUTTON
oneOf.description: Button object

oneOf.title: STRING_SELECT
oneOf.description: Select menu for picking from defined text options

oneOf.title: INPUT_TEXT
oneOf.description: Text input object

oneOf.title: USER_SELECT
oneOf.description: Select menu for users

oneOf.title: ROLE_SELECT
oneOf.description: Select menu for roles

oneOf.title: MENTIONABLE_SELECT
oneOf.description: Select menu for mentionables (users and roles)

oneOf.title: CHANNEL_SELECT
oneOf.description: Select menu for channels

oneOf.title: DEFAULT
oneOf.description: Reference to a message

oneOf.title: INTEGER_LESS_THAN_EQUAL
oneOf.description: the metadata value (integer) is less than or equal to the guild's configured value (integer)

oneOf.title: INTEGER_GREATER_THAN_EQUAL
oneOf.description: the metadata value (integer) is greater than or equal to the guild's configured value (integer)

oneOf.title: INTEGER_EQUAL
oneOf.description: the metadata value (integer) is equal to the guild's configured value (integer)

oneOf.title: INTEGER_NOT_EQUAL
oneOf.description: the metadata value (integer) is not equal to the guild's configured value (integer)

oneOf.title: DATETIME_LESS_THAN_EQUAL
oneOf.description: the metadata value (ISO8601 string) is less than or equal to the guild's configured value (integer; days before current date)

oneOf.title: DATETIME_GREATER_THAN_EQUAL
oneOf.description: the metadata value (ISO8601 string) is greater than or equal to the guild's configured value (integer; days before current date)

oneOf.title: BOOLEAN_EQUAL
oneOf.description: the metadata value (integer) is equal to the guild's configured value (integer; 1)

oneOf.title: BOOLEAN_NOT_EQUAL
oneOf.description: the metadata value (integer) is not equal to the guild's configured value (integer; 1)

oneOf.title: IDENTIFY
oneOf.description: allows /users/@me without email

oneOf.title: EMAIL
oneOf.description: enables /users/@me to return an email

oneOf.title: CONNECTIONS
oneOf.description: allows /users/@me/connections to return linked third-party accounts

oneOf.title: GUILDS
oneOf.description: allows /users/@me/guilds to return basic information about all of a user's guilds

oneOf.title: GUILDS_JOIN
oneOf.description: allows /guilds/{guild.id}/members/{user.id} to be used for joining users to a guild

oneOf.title: GUILDS_MEMBERS_READ
oneOf.description: allows /users/@me/guilds/{guild.id}/member to return a user's member information in a guild

oneOf.title: GDM_JOIN
oneOf.description: allows your app to join users to a group dm

oneOf.title: BOT
oneOf.description: for oauth2 bots, this puts the bot in the user's selected guild by default

oneOf.title: RPC
oneOf.description: for local rpc server access, this allows you to control a user's local Discord client - requires Discord approval

oneOf.title: RPC_NOTIFICATIONS_READ
oneOf.description: for local rpc server access, this allows you to receive notifications pushed out to the user - requires Discord approval

oneOf.title: RPC_VOICE_READ
oneOf.description: for local rpc server access, this allows you to read a user's voice settings and listen for voice events - requires Discord approval

oneOf.title: RPC_VOICE_WRITE
oneOf.description: for local rpc server access, this allows you to update a user's voice settings - requires Discord approval

oneOf.title: RPC_VIDEO_READ
oneOf.description: for local rpc server access, this allows you to read a user's video status - requires Discord approval

oneOf.title: RPC_VIDEO_WRITE
oneOf.description: for local rpc server access, this allows you to update a user's video settings - requires Discord approval

oneOf.title: RPC_SCREENSHARE_READ
oneOf.description: for local rpc server access, this allows you to read a user's screenshare status- requires Discord approval

oneOf.title: RPC_SCREENSHARE_WRITE
oneOf.description: for local rpc server access, this allows you to update a user's screenshare settings- requires Discord approval

oneOf.title: RPC_ACTIVITIES_WRITE
oneOf.description: for local rpc server access, this allows you to update a user's activity - requires Discord approval

oneOf.title: WEBHOOK_INCOMING
oneOf.description: this generates a webhook that is returned in the oauth token response for authorization code grants

oneOf.title: MESSAGES_READ
oneOf.description: for local rpc server api access, this allows you to read messages from all client channels (otherwise restricted to channels/guilds your app creates)

oneOf.title: APPLICATIONS_BUILDS_UPLOAD
oneOf.description: allows your app to upload/update builds for a user's applications - requires Discord approval

oneOf.title: APPLICATIONS_BUILDS_READ
oneOf.description: allows your app to read build data for a user's applications

oneOf.title: APPLICATIONS_COMMANDS
oneOf.description: allows your app to use commands in a guild

oneOf.title: APPLICATIONS_COMMANDS_PERMISSIONS_UPDATE
oneOf.description: allows your app to update permissions for its commands in a guild a user has permissions to

oneOf.title: APPLICATIONS_COMMANDS_UPDATE
oneOf.description: allows your app to update its commands using a Bearer token - client credentials grant only

oneOf.title: APPLICATIONS_STORE_UPDATE
oneOf.description: allows your app to read and update store data (SKUs, store listings, achievements, etc.) for a user's applications

oneOf.title: APPLICATIONS_ENTITLEMENTS
oneOf.description: allows your app to read entitlements for a user's applications

oneOf.title: ACTIVITIES_READ
oneOf.description: allows your app to fetch data from a user's "Now Playing/Recently Played" list - requires Discord approval

oneOf.title: ACTIVITIES_WRITE
oneOf.description: allows your app to update a user's activity - requires Discord approval (NOT REQUIRED FOR GAMESDK ACTIVITY MANAGER)

oneOf.title: RELATIONSHIPS_READ
oneOf.description: allows your app to know a user's friends and implicit relationships - requires Discord approval

oneOf.title: VOICE
oneOf.description: allows your app to connect to voice on user's behalf and see all the voice members - requires Discord approval

oneOf.title: DM_CHANNELS_READ
oneOf.description: allows your app to see information about the user's DMs and group DMs - requires Discord approval

oneOf.title: ROLE_CONNECTIONS_WRITE
oneOf.description: allows your app to update a user's connection and metadata for the app

oneOf.title: OPENID
oneOf.description: for OpenID Connect, this allows your app to receive user id and basic profile information

oneOf.title: MULTIPLE_CHOICE
oneOf.description: Multiple choice options

oneOf.title: DROPDOWN
oneOf.description: Many options shown as a dropdown

oneOf.title: NONE
oneOf.description: Guild has not unlocked any Server Boost perks

oneOf.title: TIER_1
oneOf.description: Guild has unlocked Server Boost level 1 perks

oneOf.title: TIER_2
oneOf.description: Guild has unlocked Server Boost level 2 perks

oneOf.title: TIER_3
oneOf.description: Guild has unlocked Server Boost level 3 perks

oneOf.title: NONE
oneOf.description: None

oneOf.title: TIER_1
oneOf.description: Nitro Classic

oneOf.title: TIER_2
oneOf.description: Nitro Standard

oneOf.title: TIER_0
oneOf.description: Nitro Basic

oneOf.title: PUBLIC
oneOf.description: The Stage instance is visible publicly. (deprecated)

oneOf.title: GUILD_ONLY
oneOf.description: The Stage instance is visible publicly. (deprecated)

oneOf.title: STANDARD
oneOf.description: an official sticker in a pack, part of Nitro or in a removed purchasable pack

oneOf.title: GUILD
oneOf.description: a sticker uploaded to a guild for the guild's members

oneOf.title: INVITED
oneOf.description: User has been invited to the team.

oneOf.title: ACCEPTED
oneOf.description: User has accepted the team invitation.

oneOf.title: SHORT
oneOf.description: Single-line input

oneOf.title: PARAGRAPH
oneOf.description: Multi-line input

oneOf.title: ONE_HOUR
oneOf.description: One hour

oneOf.title: ONE_DAY
oneOf.description: One day

oneOf.title: THREE_DAY
oneOf.description: Three days

oneOf.title: SEVEN_DAY
oneOf.description: Seven days

oneOf.title: LATEST_ACTIVITY
oneOf.description: Sort forum posts by activity

oneOf.title: CREATION_DATE
oneOf.description: Sort forum posts by creation time (from most recent to oldest)

oneOf.title: ALL_MESSAGES
oneOf.description: members will receive notifications for all messages by default

oneOf.title: ONLY_MENTIONS
oneOf.description: members will receive notifications only for messages that @mention them by default

oneOf.title: NONE
oneOf.description: unrestricted

oneOf.title: LOW
oneOf.description: must have verified email on account

oneOf.title: MEDIUM
oneOf.description: must be registered on Discord for longer than 5 minutes

oneOf.title: HIGH
oneOf.description: must be a member of the server for longer than 10 minutes

oneOf.title: VERY_HIGH
oneOf.description: must have a verified phone number

oneOf.title: AUTO
oneOf.description: Discord chooses the quality for optimal performance

oneOf.title: GUILD_INCOMING
oneOf.description: Incoming Webhooks can post messages to channels with a generated token

oneOf.title: CHANNEL_FOLLOWER
oneOf.description: Channel Follower Webhooks are internal webhooks used with Channel Following to post new messages into channels

oneOf.title: APPLICATION_INCOMING
oneOf.description: Application webhooks are webhooks used with Interactions

oneOf.title: SHIELD
oneOf.description: shield style widget with Discord icon and guild members online count

oneOf.title: BANNER1
oneOf.description: large image with guild icon, name and online count. "POWERED BY DISCORD" as the footer of the widget

oneOf.title: BANNER2
oneOf.description: smaller widget style with guild icon, name and online count. Split on the right with Discord logo

oneOf.title: BANNER3
oneOf.description: large image with guild icon, name and online count. In the footer, Discord logo on the left and "Chat Now" on the right

oneOf.title: BANNER4
oneOf.description: large Discord logo at the top of the widget. Guild icon, name and online count in the middle portion of the widget and a "JOIN MY SERVER" button at the bottom

Error.description: A single error, either for an API response or a specific field.

code.description: Discord internal error code. See error code reference

_errors.description: The list of errors for this field

ErrorResponse.description: Errors object returned by the Discord API

scopes.activities.read: allows your app to fetch data from a user's "Now Playing/Recently Played" list - requires Discord approval
scopes.activities.write: allows your app to update a user's activity - requires Discord approval (NOT REQUIRED FOR GAMESDK ACTIVITY MANAGER)
scopes.applications.builds.read: allows your app to read build data for a user's applications
scopes.applications.builds.upload: allows your app to upload/update builds for a user's applications - requires Discord approval
scopes.applications.commands: allows your app to use commands in a guild
scopes.applications.commands.permissions.update: allows your app to update permissions for its commands in a guild a user has permissions to
scopes.applications.entitlements: allows your app to read entitlements for a user's applications
scopes.applications.store.update: allows your app to read and update store data (SKUs, store listings, achievements, etc.) for a user's applications
scopes.bot: for oauth2 bots, this puts the bot in the user's selected guild by default
scopes.connections: allows /users/@me/connections to return linked third-party accounts
scopes.dm_channels.read: allows your app to see information about the user's DMs and group DMs - requires Discord approval
scopes.gdm.join: allows your app to join users to a group dm
scopes.guilds: allows /users/@me/guilds to return basic information about all of a user's guilds
scopes.guilds.join: allows /guilds/{guild.id}/members/{user.id} to be used for joining users to a guild
scopes.guilds.members.read: allows /users/@me/guilds/{guild.id}/member to return a user's member information in a guild
scopes.messages.read: for local rpc server api access, this allows you to read messages from all client channels (otherwise restricted to channels/guilds your app creates)
scopes.openid: for OpenID Connect, this allows your app to receive user id and basic profile information
scopes.relationships.read: allows your app to know a user's friends and implicit relationships - requires Discord approval
scopes.rpc: for local rpc server access, this allows you to control a user's local Discord client - requires Discord approval
scopes.rpc.activities.write: for local rpc server access, this allows you to update a user's activity - requires Discord approval
scopes.rpc.notifications.read: for local rpc server access, this allows you to receive notifications pushed out to the user - requires Discord approval
scopes.rpc.screenshare.read: for local rpc server access, this allows you to read a user's screenshare status- requires Discord approval
scopes.rpc.screenshare.write: for local rpc server access, this allows you to update a user's screenshare settings- requires Discord approval
scopes.rpc.video.read: for local rpc server access, this allows you to read a user's video status - requires Discord approval
scopes.rpc.video.write: for local rpc server access, this allows you to update a user's video settings - requires Discord approval
scopes.rpc.voice.read: for local rpc server access, this allows you to read a user's voice settings and listen for voice events - requires Discord approval
scopes.rpc.voice.write: for local rpc server access, this allows you to update a user's voice settings - requires Discord approval
scopes.voice: allows your app to connect to voice on user's behalf and see all the voice members - requires Discord approval
scopes.webhook.incoming: this generates a webhook that is returned in the oauth token response for authorization code grants

scopes.activities.read: allows your app to fetch data from a user's "Now Playing/Recently Played" list - requires Discord approval
scopes.activities.write: allows your app to update a user's activity - requires Discord approval (NOT REQUIRED FOR GAMESDK ACTIVITY MANAGER)

scopes.rpc.screenshare.write: for local rpc server access, this allows you to update a user's screenshare settings- requires Discord approval
scopes.rpc.video.read: for local rpc server access, this allows you to read a user's video status - requires Discord approval
scopes.rpc.video.write: for local rpc server access, this allows you to update a user's video settings - requires Discord approval
scopes.rpc.voice.read: for local rpc server access, this allows you to read a user's voice settings and listen for voice events - requires Discord approval
scopes.rpc.voice.write: for local rpc server access, this allows you to update a user's voice settings - requires Discord approval
scopes.voice: allows your app to connect to voice on user's behalf and see all the voice members - requires Discord approval
scopes.webhook.incoming: this generates a webhook that is returned in the oauth token response for authorization code grants

scopes.activities.read: allows your app to fetch data from a user's "Now Playing/Recently Played" list - requires Discord approval
scopes.activities.write: allows your app to update a user's activity - requires Discord approval (NOT REQUIRED FOR GAMESDK ACTIVITY MANAGER)
scopes.applications.builds.read: allows your app to read build data for a user's applications
scopes.applications.builds.upload: allows your app to upload/update builds for a user's applications - requires Discord approval
scopes.applications.commands: allows your app to use commands in a guild
scopes.applications.commands.permissions.update: allows your app to update permissions for its commands in a guild a user has permissions to
scopes.applications.entitlements: allows your app to read entitlements for a user's applications
scopes.applications.store.update: allows your app to read and update store data (SKUs, store listings, achievements, etc.) for a user's applications
scopes.bot: for oauth2 bots, this puts the bot in the user's selected guild by default
scopes.connections: allows /users/@me/connections to return linked third-party accounts
scopes.dm_channels.read: allows your app to see information about the user's DMs and group DMs - requires Discord approval
scopes.gdm.join: allows your app to join users to a group dm
scopes.guilds: allows /users/@me/guilds to return basic information about all of a user's guilds
scopes.guilds.join: allows /guilds/{guild.id}/members/{user.id} to be used for joining users to a guild
scopes.guilds.members.read: allows /users/@me/guilds/{guild.id}/member to return a user's member information in a guild
scopes.messages.read: for local rpc server api access, this allows you to read messages from all client channels (otherwise restricted to channels/guilds your app creates)
scopes.openid: for OpenID Connect, this allows your app to receive user id and basic profile information
scopes.relationships.read: allows your app to know a user's friends and implicit relationships - requires Discord approval
scopes.role_connections.write: allows your app to update a user's connection and metadata for the app
scopes.rpc: for local rpc server access, this allows you to control a user's local Discord client - requires Discord approval
scopes.rpc.activities.write: for local rpc server access, this allows you to update a user's activity - requires Discord approval
scopes.rpc.notifications.read: for local rpc server access, this allows you to receive notifications pushed out to the user - requires Discord approval
scopes.rpc.screenshare.read: for local rpc server access, this allows you to read a user's screenshare status- requires Discord approval
scopes.rpc.screenshare.write: for local rpc server access, this allows you to update a user's screenshare settings- requires Discord approval
scopes.rpc.video.read: for local rpc server access, this allows you to read a user's video status - requires Discord approval
scopes.rpc.video.write: for local rpc server access, this allows you to update a user's video settings - requires Discord approval
scopes.rpc.voice.read: for local rpc server access, this allows you to read a user's voice settings and listen for voice events - requires Discord approval
scopes.rpc.voice.write: for local rpc server access, this allows you to update a user's voice settings - requires Discord approval
scopes.voice: allows your app to connect to voice on user's behalf and see all the voice members - requires Discord approval
scopes.webhook.incoming: this generates a webhook that is returned in the oauth token response for authorization code grants
